document.full_text: dallas mavericks back-up center brendan haywood was cleared to play in tuesday's fourth game of the nba finals against the miami heat, coach rick carlisle said.
document.title: mavericks' haywood to play against the heat in game four
lines_and_colors: dallas mavericks back-up center brendan haywood was cleared to play in tuesday's fourth game of the nba finals against the miami heat, coach rick carlisle said.
